## Properties

| Property       | Attribute       | Description              | Type                             | Default    |
| -------------- | --------------- | ------------------------ | -------------------------------- | ---------- |
| `isStandalone` | `is-standalone` | The variant of the link. | `boolean`                        | `false`    |
| `size`         | `size`          | The size of the link.    | `"large" \| "medium" \| "small"` | `'medium'` |
